name: constrict
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to lower the target’s Speed by one stage.

flavor_text.diamond_pearl: The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed.
flavor_text.platinum: The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed.
flavor_text.heartgold_soulsilver: The foe is attacked with long, creeping tentacles or vines. It may also lower the target’s Speed.
